original_title: ヴァンパイア・フレンズ ~吸血少女の孤独~
overview: Asuka, a schoolgirl staying at a boarding house on a plateau for summer school, wanders into a Western-style house a short distance away. Asuka meets Haruka, a beautiful girl who lives in the Western-style house, and gradually begins to connect with her...
tagline: A girl is led to a Western-style house deep in the woods ... A forbidden summer story of two vampires and a girl.
title: Vampire Friends - Vampire Girl Loneliness
